title: [Events of 1935]
brief_description: Untitled newsreel footage of the 1935 Southport Flower Show in the UK showing various activities. Also includes scenes of the Southport Lawn Tennis Championships won by H. Ellsworth Vines and W.T. Tilden (USA), horse jumping events and the Birkdale Golf Club House.
